comments:
Build: I-20040113

I opened the workbench.  The Synchronize view was already visible and 
automatically tried to synchronize my pde.ui project with the repository.
This resulted in the following NPE:

Created an attachment (id=7476)
Messed up package explorer view

The NPE is occurring very frequently and is messing up my Package Explorer
view.

This is a startup ordering problem. I have it fixed on a branch. I will merge 
the fix to HEAD

Fix released to HEAD. TeamUIPlugin has been modified to avois race condition 
on startup.
Code reviewed with Mike. Looks good.
